summary: The Administration for Strategic Preparedness and Response (ASPR)'s workforce planning problems are ongoing. These issues were part of the reason why we added the Department of Health and Human Services' leadership in public health emergencies to our High Risk list in 2022. In this report, we recommend ways for ASPR to address the problems and improve emergency response, such as: Setting specific goals and performance...
title: Public Health Preparedness: HHS Emergency Agency Needs to Strengthen Workforce Planning
